meanings.sent1: I will preselect the songs for the party playlist.
meanings.sent2: She likes to preselect her outfits for the week on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to preselect all the ingredients for the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: Before the trip, she would preselect the places she wanted to visit like a travel expert.
meanings.sent5: He always preselects the best books to read during his vacation.

meanings.sent1: They will preselect the winners of the art contest.
meanings.sent2: You can preselect your preferred seat when booking tickets online.
meanings.sent3: The team captain decided to preselect the players for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent4: She would preselect her words carefully before giving a speech.
meanings.sent5: He likes to preselect his meals for the week to stay organized.
